mapper.insert: insert into tb_test_question_info(id, name, worktype) values (#{id},#{name},#{workType})
mapper.update: update tb_test_question_info set worktype = #{newWorkType} where worktype = #{oldWorkType}
mapper.select: select * from tb_test_question_info where name = #{questionInfoName} and worktype = #{workType}
